title: Weatherbit.io - Weather
description: This is the documentation for the Weatherbit API.  The base URL for the API is [http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/) or [https://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/). Below is the Swagger UI documentation for the API. All API requests require the `key` parameter.        An Example for a 5 day forecast for London, UK would be `http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/forecast/3hourly?city=London`&`country=UK`

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

slp.description: Mean sea level pressure in millibars (mb)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

dhi.description: Average direct component of solar insolation (W/m^2)

sun_hours.description: Average number of daily sun hours - # hours where Solar Insolation > 1000 W/m^2

max_dhi.description: Max direct component of solar insolation (W/m^2)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

snow.description: Accumulated snowfall since last forecast point. Default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

pod.description: Part of day (d = day, n = night)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

precip6h.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

snow.description: Accumulated snowfall since last forecast point. Default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

organization.example: AS11426 Time Warner Cable Internet LLC

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". All datetime is in (UTC)

max_temp_ts.description: Time of Max Temperature - Unix Timestamp

max_wind_dir.description: Direction of wind at time of max wind - (Degrees)

max_wind_spd_ts.description: Time of max wind - Unix Timestamp

min_temp_ts.description: Time of Max Temperature - Unix Timestamp

rh.description: Average relative humidity as a percentage (%)

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". All datetime is in (UTC)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

precip6h.description: Liquid equivalent precipitation in last 6 hours - Default (mm)

qc.description: Set to 0 measurement has not yet been quality controlled, and should not be considered an authoritative observation

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

actions.title: bulk.history.daily_city_city_country_country.get
actions.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

city.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

units.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

lang.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

callback.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

actions.title: bulk.file.get
actions.description: **(Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise plans only)** Downloads bulk data files - OPTIONS: (forecast16d.json.gz - 16 day forecasts for cities > 1000 population, current.json.gz - Current observations for cities > 1000 population).

actions.title: forecast.3hourly_city_city_country_country.get
actions.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

city.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

days.description: Number of days to return. Default 5.

units.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

lang.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

callback.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example - callback=func

actions.title: forecast.daily_city_city_country_country.get
actions.description: **(REQUIRED: Basic Plan or Higher)** Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC. Accepts a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

city.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

days.description: Number of days to return. Default 16.

units.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

lang.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

callback.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example - callback=func

units.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

lang.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

callback.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

actions.title: history.energy.bbox_lat1_lat1_lon1_lon1_lat2_lat2_lon2_lon2.get
actions.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period. Supply a bounding box ex: lat1=40&lon1=-78&lat2=38&lon2=-80. This API will return UP TO 150 stations, aggregated by the specified time period start_date to end_date.

units.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

callback.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
